text:
Just wrapped up a call with our Shore town mayors and Shore county leadership on beach policy as we continue our fight against #COVID19.

The Jersey Shore is part of our DNA and we all want to see it humming through the summer – but we must move strategically and safely. https://t.co/E7mJOVjNxx
